description.narrative: This is a five-year, multi-stakeholder programme that aims to support the country sustain efforts towards strengthening institutional capacities and frameworks for strengthening good governance and deepening democratic participation.

- # of laws passed - # of analytical reports produced -availability of analyzed tools for oversight function - availability of analyzed tools for parliamentary outreach - availability of study document on human resource - availability of tools for perception survey -# of MPs and parliamentary staff whose skills enhanced on various subjects - availability of study document on oversight tools -%age of the completion of the establishment of digital and paper free system -# of DIF fully institutionalized and functional -# of platforms created for stakeholders to dialogue on draft legal frameworks - # of operational tools/manuals adopted and operationalzed (EHRC) -Availability of training needs assessment report and training package -# of beneficiaries of the free legal aid services -# of human rights report produced -Availability of document on maladministration and possible solution -# of fora held involving leadership of political parties (NEBE) -Availability of comprehensive national conflict mapping and peace building document (HoF) -Availability and use of operational manual (CCI) -Availability of codified federal laws -Availability of translated federal laws into local languages -Full functioning of the coordination structures of the NHRAP -Production of monitoring and progress reports -Availability of youth and child ethics strategy -Availability of National anti-corruption perception policy (FEACC) -Established peace council to serve as platforms of public participation in peace building (MOP) -# of consultations, dialogue and conferences conducted -# of faith based networks, capacities and systems built -Availability of a media and communication assessment report

comment.narrative: -NA -None - No tools analyzed for parliamentary oversight -No tools for outreach analyzed -None - None (tools for perception survey) -NA -None -initial assessment to establish digital and pager free system for HoPR - DIF (Democratic Institutions Forum) established at federal level but needs to be institutionalized and strengthened - None - None (EHRC) -None - 82,000 beneficiaries of legal aid services -None -0 (EIO) -None (NEBE) -No comprehensive national conflict mapping (HoF) -No operational manual and case flow management system -No codified federal laws (OAG) -None of the federal laws translated into local languages (OAG) - NHRAP developed and implementation launched; but yet to be implemented -180 UPR accepted recommendations for implementation -None (FEACC) -None -No national peace council (MoP) -One national conference; No regional and local conference (MoP) -No faith based networks established -None (EBA)

- Develop one guideline for parliamentary support mechanisms of the House of People's Representative - Develop one standard tool for parliamentary oversight of the Defense and Security Sector of the Standing Committee of the parliament - Develop one guideline on civic engagement to facilitate active participation of the public - Upgrade computerized database center of EHRC - Revamp four free legal aid centers - Develop own mission investigation manual of EIO - Undertake national conflict mapping (HoF) - Undertake assessment on constitutional interpretation - Undertake two review assessment mechanism on effective constitionalism - Develop 1 code of conduct for public prosecutors (OAG) - 1 hot line(OAG) - conduct 9 awareness raising session on gender based violence - One resolution on NHRAP tabled and negotiated -1 policy and strategy document on anti-corruption(FEACC) -1 survey report -1 study report on mining sector - 3 forums conducted on anti-corruption -conduct 1 national and 10 regional dialogue forums (MoP) - conduct 1 consultative workshop for the development of peace councils - conduct peace conference in 3 regions
-

- 1 guideline for parliamentary support developed (HoPR) -1 oversight tool for defense SC developed - 4 free legal aid centers revamped -1 own mission investigation manual developed (EIO) -1 code of conduct for public prosecutors conducted (OAG) - 4 awareness session raised on gender based violence (OAG) - 1 resolution on NHRAP negotiated (OAG) - 1 policy and strategy doc on anti-corruption is under development (FEACC) - 1 perception survey on corruption is under development - 1 study doc on mining sector prepared - 1 national dialogue forum conducted (MoP) - 3 peace conference conducted

-180 trainees (MPs and staffs) - availability of study on parliamentary oversight tools -1 digital system ( 50% completed) - 5 DIF( 1 federal + 4 regional) - at least 2 platforms - 3 tools ( 2 manuals +1 strategy) -1 training need assessment report -2,000 vulnerable people/beneficiaries to get from free legal aid services from the legal aid - 6 Human rights report including the recent product -1 study document - 3 fora conducted &62 political parties take part in the fora -1 national conflict mapping document -1 operational manual - At least 3 federal laws - 3 federal laws translated into 3 local languages - 1 coordination structure for NHRAP - 1 monitoring report and progress report -1 strategy -1 study report -1 peace council -1 national inter and intra-religious conference;2 inter- regional dialogue sessions - 1 faith based networks - 1 assessment report

- 97 MPs;125 staffs trained - 1 study document produced - 20% achieved (analysis completed for the digital system) -1 DIF organized -1 platform conducted -1 manual developed -1 training assessment report produced - 4015 vulnerable people benefited from the legal aid service - 6 human right reports produced - 1 study document on maladministration prepared - 3 fora conducted and 55 political parties participated - only 50% achieved (conflict mapping) - 1 operational manual developed by CCI - 3 federal laws codified - 3 federal laws translated into 3 local languages - 1 coordination structure formed - 1 monitoring report on human rights produced -1 strategy document prepared on child and ethics - Not yet started - 1 peace council established at federal level - 1 national inter and intra religious sessions and 1 inter-religious session conducted - 1 faith based network established -1 media and communication assessment report produced

- Develop a guideline on legislation (HoPR) - publish a standardized oversight guideline - Develop content outlines for induction and sharing lessons -Undertake a comprehensive assessment of current law-making mechanisms and practices -Digitalize the documentation system of the Parliament -Prepare and develop operational manual on principles and procedures on national constitutional interpretation (HoF) -Produce and publish parliamentary guidebook for new member of HOF parliament(2020 entrants) -Introduce technology solutions for human resources management system (EHRC) -Develop a database for the compilation of national and international legal and human rights instruments (EHRC) -Establishment and revamp of peace incubation centers in conflict prone localities and all universities (MoP) -Conduct National Peace and National consensus dialogue forums (MoP) -Translate, publish and institutionalize new laws, directives, manuals, strategies and guidelines of NEBE -Roll out and publicize the newly developed NEBE's communication strategy. -Develop video conference system for the council meeting (CCI) -Develop e-library/digital library system with CCI LOGO -Organizational reform of EBA -Basic journalist training for amateurs professionals of community radio (EBA) -Develop National Anti-Corruption Policy and Strategy (FEACC) -Conduct Ethiopia Third National Corruption Perception Survey -Develop Code of conduct for higher public officials -Review contract management and administration systems of mega public projects (FEACC) -Review UNCAC second cycle (Prevention and Asset Recovery) and develop a report -Conduct a Nation wide Own-Motion Investigation on maladministration in the selected Industrial Parks (EIO) -Establish EIO's Institutional Children's' Day-care Center to realize Institutional Gender Intervention -five awareness raising sessions on human rights complaint investigation techniques to federal and regional police officers -present Ethiopia's progress report on the implementation of accepted 3rd UPR recommendations to the UN human Rights Council -Operationalize Ethiopia's National Recommendations Tracking Database for human rights (OAG) -Upgrade/strengthen database management system of OFAG with IT equipment, software development -Upgrade/strengthen the Audit Training Institute (ATI) for effective and efficient delivery of OFAG -
